description: Nexus 7 Charger is specifically designed for Google Nexus 7With its small; lightweight design and sleek appearance; CrazyOnDigital Google Nexus 7 Rapid Wall AC Travel Chargers remains highly portable and fits easily in your briefcase to save you both space and time. Google Nexus 7 Charger features Advanced internal circuitry prevents device from power surges, overcharging and short-circuiting. Compatible with Kindle Fire HD 7" and 8.9" modelsPerfect for keeping your Google Nexus 7 charged while on the go
